Business development specialist with ten years of diverse experience in international sales within the 
chemical industry, including the coatings, construction chemicals, adhesive and plastics industries. 
Executive with an entrepreneurial spirit who has proven track record of excellence in market analysis, 
identifying business opportunities, and the implementation of the necessary business development 
strategies to accomplish breakthrough sales objectives. 
 
 Market & Competitive Analysis   Start-ups & Turnarounds   Product Management  
 Client Relationship Management  Business Development  Distribution Channel Management 
 
EDUCATION  
 Master of Science in Chemical Engineering. 2008 
Department of Chemical & Biological Engineering. The State University of New York, Buffalo, USA 
 Bachelor of Science in Chemical Engineering.  2007             
      Department of Chemical & Biological Engineering. The State University of New York, Buffalo, USA 
EXPERIENCE 
ARKEMA 
Arkema Coating Solutions: Area Manager Middle East & Africa (MEA). January 2022 - present 
Arkema Coating Resins (ACR), Area Manager MEA. May 2014 – January 2022 
ACR, Global Business Development Manager for global key account. January 2015- January 2019 
ACR, Technical Sales Manager, February 2013 – May 2014 
Dubai, United Arab Emirates 
 Lead all aspect of sales, marketing, and technical services for Arkema Coating Solutions in MEA 
directing 5 Business Units of Arkema that provide innovative solutions in several industries including: 
Paints & Coatings, Construction Chemicals, Plastics, Textile & Leather, Inks, Home & Personal Care and 
Water Treatments industries.  
 Immediate impact and successfully re-established Arkema Coating business in the Middle East region 
exceeding the annual sales budget by an average of 10% for the past 8 years. 
 Expanded the sourcing activity into the Middle East from Arkema Europe facilities to also include 
Arkema India, Malaysia and China facilities with the sourcing choice determined by value for the 
Business Unit. This strategic approach has provided the business with flexibility towards currency 
fluctuation into USD market, products availability, and increased products portfolio.  
 Formulate short / long-term business plans and strategies for every Arkema Business Unit to ensure 
business growth and expansion in the MEA. Identify opportunities and partners for merge and 
acquisition. Involved in several M&A projects.  
 Define opportunities and support Arkema R&D to customize products that suit Middle East local 
requirements. 
 Directed Arkema to a leading position in the industrial coating market in Middle East. Successfully 
penetrated the vehicle refinishing market and regained position with global accounts in the protective 
coating sector. 
 Focus on direct business; developed over 200 new customer accounts. The direct business approach 
has enriched the relationship with the customers, enhanced efficiency, improved profitability, and 
gained new businesses.  
 Initiated Arkema logistic hubs project in MEA. Setting up a warehouse for Arkema in Dubai to support 
MEA customers with the speciality business, enhance services and thus improve profitability.  
 Restructured agency and distribution channels in MEA.

development to achieve a leading market position in the polyurethane industry in the Middle. Scope 
of responsibility included all core executive leadership, operating management, research and 
development, procurement management, sales and marketing.
